name: Cage-Face
description:
You cannot sleep just yet.

You just found a new lead; another piece of the puzzle. It is the biggest potential key to the mystery so far.

The past few months you have been waiting for every bit of information to slowly arrive at your desk. This night, a VHS tape has surfaced. You cannot wait until morning. This has to been seen right now. It is your responsibility to report anything you find after all.

Take a look and see what it has to offer.

ControlsMove
W, A, S, D LookMouseExamineLeft Mouse
RunLeft ShiftCrouchLeft Ctrl, COptionsTabExit GameEscape
